name: Hankook Tire & Technology Co., Ltd.
description: Hankook Tire & Technology Co., Ltd. is a leading global tire manufacturer headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. Established in 1941, the company has grown to become one of the top tire producers in the world, recognized for its innovative tire technology and commitment to quality. Hankook specializes in the design and manufacturing of tires for passenger cars, trucks, buses, and motorsport, offering a wide range of products that cater to various driving conditions and performance needs. The company focuses on research and development, investing significantly in technology to enhance tire performance, safety, and environmental sustainability. Hankook is known for its premium quality tires, such as the Ventus series for high-performance vehicles and the Kinergy line for all-season comfort. With a strong emphasis on sustainability, Hankook aims to reduce its environmental footprint through eco-friendly practices in tire production. The company's commitment to excellence is reflected in its extensive global presence, serving customers in over 180 countries while continuously expanding its market share through innovative products and strategic partnerships. Through its dedication to customer satisfaction and technological advancement, Hankook Tire maintains its position as a trusted brand among automotive enthusiasts and professionals alike.

seo.meta_title: Hankook Tire & Technology Co., Ltd. | Innovative Tire Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Hankook Tire & Technology Co., Ltd., a global leader in tire manufacturing. Discover their innovative products, commitment to sustainability, and impact on the automotive industry.

faq.question: What does Hankook Tire specialize in?
faq.answer: Hankook Tire specializes in the design and manufacturing of tires for passenger cars, trucks, buses, and motorsport.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Hankook Tire?
faq.answer: The CEO of Hankook Tire is Soil Lee.

faq.question: Where is Hankook Tire headquartered?
faq.answer: Hankook Tire is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

faq.question: What are some popular tire products from Hankook?
faq.answer: Popular tire products from Hankook include the Ventus series and Kinergy line.
